actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide for an extension of the delimiting period for Vietnam era veterans pursuing a program of Apprenticeship, On the Job or Cooperative Training.
short_title: Vietnam Veterans Employment and Training Delimiting Date Extension Act

summary.text: Vietnam Veterans Employment and Training Delimiting Date Extension Act - Extends the delimiting period for veterans serving on active duty on or after August 5, 1964, and pursuing a program of apprenticeship, on-the-job, or cooperative training for up to three years.

titles.title: Vietnam Veterans Employment and Training Delimiting Date Extension Act

A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide for an extension of the delimiting period for Vietnam era veterans pursuing a program of Apprenticeship, On the Job or Cooperative Training.
